Text: You can safely ignore the number of seeds. I am seeding it right now. And I intend to seed it for a long time.

Bdw, are developers planing to put v-sync into the game. Forcing it on my ati HD 3850 didn't work. This is the only game which screen tears for me but I love it so much.

Sorry for asking it here, I can't find technical support on the forums.

Come to the forums and send me a PM. I will see what we can figure out about this issue. Or just tell me your username there and I will PM you.

(I searched for "Geroshina" and found no users there with the name.)

Or you can come here. I made a thread for discussion about your troubles.

The people here are kind and will gladly help resolve this if at all possible.
